Class Reservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Reservation

  • public class Reservation
extends java.lang.Object
    * This class implements a simple object of Reservation.

    This class is where the user finishes and recieves his/her ticket in the form of a txt file.

    Author:
    Jose Delgado, Alexis Leon, Ajay Patel

      • Reservation

        public Reservation(java.lang.String airline,
                   java.lang.String fname,
                   java.lang.String ssn,
                   double budget,
                   java.util.HashMap map)
        This constructs the Reservations with the first name, his/her budget the airline, and txt file of flights he/her may go to
        Parameters:
        airline - that the user chooses
        fname - The first name of the user
        ssn - The Social Security number of the User
        budget - The amount the user may spend on his/her flight
        map - This is what contains the flight along with the price

    • Method Detail

      • purchase

        public static double purchase(java.lang.String answer,
                              java.lang.String ssn)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.text.ParseException
        In this method it prompts the user to enter what location/destination will like to go to

        It also passes the cost and the location of their visit to the seat class where it determines the total cost for the trip.

        Parameters:
        ssn -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws the exception when the input is failed to be interpreted
        java.text.ParseException

      • CashCheck

        public static double CashCheck(java.lang.Double cost,
                               double budget)
        This method simply determines if the user has enough funds in order to continue with the reservation process.

        If the user has more than enough within in their budget the program simply continues However, the program with terminate if the user does not have enough funds.

        Parameters:
        cost - Total cost of the trip to help determine if the user has sufficient funds
        budget - The budget that the user is willing to spend on the flight.

      • FinalizePurchase

        public static java.lang.String FinalizePurchase(double cost,
                                                char row,
                                                int number,
                                                java.lang.String visit,
                                                java.lang.String answer,
                                                java.lang.String ssn)
                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                java.text.ParseException
        In this method the user will recieve notice that the their reservation was a success.

        It created a txt document called reservations with some of the users information. This serves as the users receipt/ticket for their flight. At the end of the proccess the user has the option to add companions to go with him/her

        Parameters:
        cost - This is the total cost of the flight.
        row - This is the Letter that will be given to the user to find their seat.
        number - Along with row this helps the user find their seat.
        visit - This is the location of their visit.
        answer - This is what passes to the addCompanion method it the users desired location
        ssn - The ssn that the user has.
        Returns:
        returns a string for testing purposes.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.text.ParseException
